ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Cantana of Soothing
ygData.msgSnippet: Afraid not. She was pretty busy. I think her guild may have been out there and she just ported back to make a little money and was headed back. Was busy with
ygData.messageBody:
Afraid not. She was pretty busy. I think her guild may have been out there
and she just ported back to make a little money and was headed back. Was
busy with our conversations as well at the time, so I didn't press the
issue. I'll keep my ear out, but since I haven't bought Velious (ie.
married, whose wife's highest character is level 26) others will have that
info well before I get it. :-P

---Windleaf

At 01:32 PM 12/5/00 -0600, Mott, Mike J. wrote:
>Did the druid give you a clue where the vendor was? That is gonna be the
>big battle over the next few days, as we all go out and try to find locs,
>zone points etc.
>
>Lago
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: John Tatsukawa [SMTP:john@...]
> > Sent: Tuesday, December 05, 2000 1:28 PM
> > To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > Subject: [eqbards] Cantana of Soothing
> >
> > A druid sold me this song last night (I guess they opened up Velious
> > around
> > midnight or so).
> >
> > Definitely requires string, and it gives a buff shield (looks the same as
> > an enchanter's clarity symbol). No quantitative info beyond that I'm
> > afraid. Would be interesting to find out more stats about it since it does
> >
> > heal/stamina/clarity, but this would mean more weaving during downtime
> > since we can weave this with our clarity song.
> >
> > ---Windleaf
> >
> >
> >
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> > with the subject submissions.
> >
>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
>with the subject submissions.
